## rds-workflow-header Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Slots

| Slot            | Description                                                                                     |
| --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"action"`      | Use this slot to add action(s) to the right side of your workflow header.                       |
| `"description"` | Use this slot to add additional description or components to the center of the workflow header. |
| `"title"`       | Use this slot to add a title to the left side of your workflow header.                          |


----------------------------------------------

_Built for Resilience Design System @ FM Global_
